UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cholesterol-conjugated stapled peptides inhibit Ebola and Marburg viruses in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Author: Pessi A, Bixler SL, Soloveva V, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Ebola virus EBOV(IC50 I=9.04±1.23µM),Ebola virus EBOV(IC90 I=24.79µM),Marburg virus MARV(IC50 I=8.13±0.96µM),Marburg virus MARV(IC90 I=31.30µM),Sudan virus SUDV(IC50 I=4.94±1.10µM),Sudan virus SUDV(IC90 I=25.03µM),Chikungunya virus (CHIKV)(IC50 I=>30µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>30µM),Human osteosarcoma U2OS(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>30µM)
